text: We're not in Kansas anymore, Toto ..." Litimetrics has extended document (complaints, memos, motions) and docket coverage to SDNY, EDNY, CACD, CAND, CASD, Connecticut, DC, SD Florida, ND Illinois, NJ, MD, MA, ED Michigan, ED Pennsylvania, ED Texas, ED Virginia, and Kansas. pic.twitter.com/0QyL1P8DG0"

Then there are the likes of @kpmgaustralia working away quietly on innovations. ...so...yeah, we’re pretty sure there’s more than conferences and hackathons happening in #AusLaw #LegalTech but perhaps though we’re just seeing more because we’re #doing rather than watching.

...and that’s both APAC based and international #LegalTech providers. Even if they’re international vendors, many have amazing APAC technical talent, management, and/or funding behind them like @NeotaLogic @OnePlaceGlobal .
...and that is of course without mentioning the plethora of #lawfirms in #AusLaw who are working behind the scenes on various initiatives with clients and #LegalTech providers.
